data.name: VEGA Conflict - Dominion Pack
data.detailed_description:
General Geir’s infamous flagship can turn even the quietest fleet into an offensive hurricane. Buy the Dominion Pack now and receive the following:

Dominion Carrier (x2) - Carrying 6 Squadron slots and an Agility Boost Support Field, the Dominion Carrier is all firepower and zero apologies.

20,000 Coins- Providing you with the ability to build upon your base assets with the latest tech and resources. Bonus Coins will ensure you make your mark in the sector.

Bonus consumable equipment credits guarantee your Dominion Carrier is as dangerous an offensive powerhouse as it can be:

- Gladiator Swarm III (x12)
- Fusion Thrusters III (x2)
data.about_the_game:
General Geir’s infamous flagship can turn even the quietest fleet into an offensive hurricane. Buy the Dominion Pack now and receive the following:

Dominion Carrier (x2) - Carrying 6 Squadron slots and an Agility Boost Support Field, the Dominion Carrier is all firepower and zero apologies.

20,000 Coins- Providing you with the ability to build upon your base assets with the latest tech and resources. Bonus Coins will ensure you make your mark in the sector.

Bonus consumable equipment credits guarantee your Dominion Carrier is as dangerous an offensive powerhouse as it can be:

data.short_description: General Geir’s infamous flagship can turn even the quietest fleet into an offensive hurricane. Buy now and get 2 Dominion Carriers, enough Gladiator Swarms to fully outfit both hulls, and Fusion Thrusters to ensure maximum mobility. Your enemies don’t stand a chance!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Portuguese-Brazil
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP+
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.8GHz, SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible with OS

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7+
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.8GHz, SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible with OS
